entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gods Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Island Lake Airport 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 38 %

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
